H0.text: Weaker bones is an effect of regular exercise.

H1.text: Less energy is an effect of regular exercise.

H2.text: Better hearing is an effect of regular exercise.

H3.text: Stronger heart is an effect of regular exercise.

A4.text: Physical inactivity has been found to cause a wide range of non-communicable diseases, including coronary heart disease, stroke, diabetes mellitus and depression.
